Package leitej.util.machine

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HeapMemoryUsageWarn.Listener
    Interface that listener from HeapMemoryUsageWarn needs to implement.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BlockSystemExit
    BlockSystemExit - do not allow the execution of System.exit
    ConsoleUtil
    An useful class to help in interact with console.
    HeapMemoryUsageWarn
    An useful class to help control heap memory.
    ShutdownHookUtil
    An useful class to help in interact with Runtime.getRuntime().addShutdownHook(Thread).

    If the virtual machine is already in the process of shutting down or if a security manager is present and it denies RuntimePermission("shutdownHooks"), a SeppukuLtRtException with code 1 will be raised.
    UserUtil
    An useful class to help get user information.
    VMMonitor
    An useful class to help get VM information.
    XSecurityManager
    The class XSecurityManager and its subclasses are a form of SecurityManager.
    Useful to programmatically change JVM security measures.

    Only can be used one instance at a time.
